snippet.title: TEVI－Announcing Teaser
snippet.description:
TEVI is a 2D pixel art action-adventure game that combines Metroidvania, bullet hell, and spectacle fighter elements. Explore a lush, vast world, uncover hidden secrets, upgrade and customize your abilities and gear to execute flashy combos, and battle formidable bosses with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay.

Play as a nimble, bunny-eared adventurer who embarks on a journey across the vibrant, sprawling world of Az with her two angel and demon companions. Great mysteries and dangers await...

More information about TEVI will be released in the near future. Be the first to get the latest news by following CreSpirit's official Facebook account.

－
【Our Links】

｜Steam｜

．Publisher：https://store.steampowered.com/curator/41219227-CreSpirit/

｜ Website｜
．event site：https://www.tevi.games

#Metroidvania #bullethell #pixelart #steam #ps4 #ps5 #playstation #switch #indiegame
